content.description: Climb up the middle of the face on great holds.
content.protection: 4 bolts to mussy hook anchor. Lower off.
content.location: 10 feet left of the corner crack.

climbs.name: Romulan Ramp
climbs.fa: Chris Miller and Reed Ames, November 2020

content.description:
Positive patina plates up a prow gain a left slanting ramp at the base of a steep headwall. Tiptoe up the ramp via improbable movement that goes at at a surprisingly moderate grade and leads into the juggy finish of

Cosmic Wave

.
content.protection:
TR from anchors on

Cosmic Wave

.
content.location:
Start uphill and right of

Cosmic Wave

at the right edge of the south face.

climbs.name: Cosmic Wave
climbs.fa: Reed Ames, Chuck Scott, Kyle Campbell

content.description: Stem to clip the first bolt, then pull onto the wall. At the crux look for good holds out left. Anchor is up and right from last bolt.
content.protection: 5 bolts to mussy hook anchor, lower off.
content.location: On the right side of the Cosmic Crag

content.description:
Climb up excellent patina on the smaller pillar past two bolts. Once you're standing on the smaller rock, continue to move up as you clip the 2 bolts on the main face to your right. After you have clipped the last bolt step out right and traverse to the anchor.

Beta alert----- It helps to step down and right to gain the main face, then head back up and right to the anchor. The last bolt should be at your face level when you step onto main face.
content.protection:
4 bolts to mussy hook anchor. Lower off.

This route shares an anchor with the 11d to the right.
content.location: This is the left most sport route at the Cosmic Crag. Starts on a smaller face.

content.description: To the right of the corner.
content.protection: Bolts to mussy hook anchor, lower off.

content.description:
The obvious corner crack in the middle of the Cosmic Crag. Hard start if you're shorter. Takes great gear all the way. Can build a gear anchor or use the bolted anchor for the route to the right.

If you don't have gear you can set up a TR off the bolted anchor.
content.location: Obvious corner crack in the middle of the Cosmic Crag. Can see it from the parking area.
